classloader chain broken

When we have a library deployed in higher level classloader (System class loader, for instance) that references a class that is loaded by a lower level classloader (web application classloader), catalina fails to load the "lower level class" with an error "java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError"

This behaviour is not consistent whith the explanations found on the documentation.

This problem can be reproduced using the attached test application (deploy the "external" jar under the catalina lib directory, and deploy the web application. When you access the application the error will arise).
creator: egarcia@stream18.com
markt@apache.org
text: You can't have a library loaded by the common class loader requiring a class that is not visible to the common class loader. Ask on the users list if you need more explanation.
And if you introduce this library in a new classpath (no in the common)?. The  behaviour is the same, but in this case is not the common class loader.
